addons.name: Browsec VPN
addons.description:
Encrypts traffic and unlocks sites.

Facebook closed by an overzealous sysadmin? Browsec to the rescue!

Browsec encrypts your traffic and routes it through our secure cloud. No one will be able to identify, track you or sniff your traffic.
addons.fullDescription:
- Visit Facebook and twitter from work, read whatever you want.
- Privacy. Hide your real location from the sites you visit.
- Netflix, Hulu, Spotify, Pandora, SoundCloud and so on â€” music and video services restricted to a few countries are now accessible to you too.

Browsec is Firefox extension. It is an advanced analog of ZenMate, Stealthy, Hola and friGate.
